features.title: Why is it the best cover?
features.description: A wheel cover is an essential piece of equipment in bike polo, designed to prevent mallets and balls from getting caught in the spokes during play. Our premium wheel covers are crafted from durable materials and precisely engineered to fit multiple wheel sizes. They not only enhance safety but also add a distinctive look to your bike polo setup, allowing you to focus on your game with confidence.

items.cover: Premium wheel cover in the size you picked (26", 650b, or 700c)
items.hardware: Set of mounting hardware for your spoke count (32 or 36 spokes)

promo.title: Get a pair, save 5%
promo.description: Because your bike has two wheels! Order a matching pair of wheel covers and save 5% on your purchase. Whether you need two of the same size or different sizes for your front and back wheels, the discount applies to any combination. Double the protection, double the style!
